mathematica: a[n_] := First[IntegerDigits[n^2]]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 100} (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Dec 21 2008 *)First[IntegerDigits[#]]&/@(Range[70]^2) (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Feb 09 2011 *)
